name: OpenDurian Co.
description: Operator of an online learning platform designed to cover a wide spectrum of educational tests. The company's platform provides free and premium online test-preparation materials written by expert instructors and covers courses that are relevant from school-college admissions and language proficiency to professional certification exams, providing students a high-quality production of online courses with a medium to encounter problems through reading books and failing exams.
